GenomicED 0.1.0
  • Reference

Pairs between Beaf-32 Peaks and TSS on 2L and 2R chromosomes.

Source: R/interactions.gni.R
interactions.gni.Rd

Data from a ChIp Seq experiment

Usage

data(interactions.gni)

Format

An object of class GInteractions.

Examples

data(interactions.gni)
interactions.gni
#> GInteractions object with 351 interactions and 15 metadata columns:
